r.n:
2010/10/06, PHP_Obfuscator 1.0.2 - added -c option - fixed bootstrap code
2010/10/04, PHP_Obfuscator 1.0.1 - fixed -f option
2010/10/04, PHP_Obfuscator 1.0.0 - support STDIN - support filter arguments
2010/07/02, PHP_Obfuscator 0.1.0 - initial release
